## SequenceFunction type

A sequence function is a function implementing a custom sequence of actions to handle an incoming request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SequenceFunction = (context: RequestContext, sequence: DefaultSequence) => Promise<void> | void;
```
